promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young rare eagle electric-type pokemon wearing a ancient crown. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or eagle. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltalon, a a chibi young rare eagle electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Swirling Flow. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "eagle", "electric" or "Voltalon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, eagle-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Discovered in stormy regions, this tiny avian wonder, Voltalon, harnesses crashing thunder for power. With Swirling Flow, it can control currents!
